Package com.koalog.util.cmdline

Class Summary
CommandLineArgumentsHelper Provides utility methods for dealing with command-line arguments.
CommandLineOption This class represents a command line option.
CommandLineParser Parses a command-line (represented by a string array) of the form: [OPTIONS] ARGUMENTS, with the following conventions (POSIX, GNU and custom): An option is a hyphen followed by a single alphanumeric character, like this: -o.
DefaultCommandLineParser Default command line parser.
GUICommandLineParser Default command line parser for GUI applications.
 

Exception Summary
BadOptionUsageException This exception is thrown: when one tries to access the argument value of an option that doesn't have an argument, when one tries to check if an option, which requires an argument, is enabled.
InvalidCommandLineException This exception is thrown when the command line is invalid.
